tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    packet_size INT,
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    packet_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE cybersecurity_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(20),
    description TEXT,
    severity INT,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_address VARCHAR(255),
    destination_address VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_type VARCHAR(50),
    bytes_transferred INT
)

CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    detection_type VARCHAR(50),
    severity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES security_events(event_id)
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    data_amount INT
);

CREATE TABLE malicious_traffic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    threat_level VARCHAR(20),
    attack_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    action_taken TEXT,
    log_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cyber_threats (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_name VARCHAR(50),
    threat_type VARCHAR(30),
    attack_signature TEXT,
    threat_desc TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_data (
    id SERIAL,
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    port INTEGER,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id SERIAL,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(20),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_logs (
    log_id SERIAL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_details TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_device_id INTEGER,
    destination_device_id INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id SERIAL,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    reported_by VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
